parse.title: Creatures of Daemonheim
parse.text:
Creatures of Daemonheim are a type of Slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Masters
  • 2 Eligible monsters
    • 2.1 Surface
    • 2.2 Dungeoneering
    • 2.3 Quest
  • 3 Update history

Slayer Masters[edit | edit source]

The following Slayer Masters assign creatures of Daemonheim:

MasterTask amountsUnlock requirements
Laniakea101-150None

Brute70002,500

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 24 April 2023 (Update):
    • The Edimmu room is now accessible with suitable Slayer Tasks such as ghost, zombie, undead, Creatures of Daemonheim, and Edimmu selected.
  • patch 27 January 2020 (Update):
    • Frost dragons will now consistently work towards both Dragons cluster tasks and Creatures of Daemonheim cluster tasks assigned from Laniakea.
  • patch 6 January 2020 (Update):
    • Creatures of Daemonheim Slayer task now include all creatures.
